tests.name: Automatic "My Smartprofile" creation on first auth
Profile access based on identity graph

data.error:
Invalid `prisma.user.findUnique()` invocation in
/usr/src/app/src/middleware/auth.ts:59:36

  56 const payload = verifyAccessToken(token);
  57 
  58 // Verify user exists (remove device requirement)
→ 59 const user = await prisma.user.findUnique({
       where: {
         id: undefined,
     ?   email?: String,
     ?   AND?: UserWhereInput | UserWhereInput[],
     ?   OR?: UserWhereInput[],
     ?   NOT?: UserWhereInput | UserWhereInput[],
     ?   hashedPassword?: StringNullableFilter | String | Null,
     ?   emailVerified?: BoolFilter | Boolean,
     ?   createdAt?: DateTimeFilter | DateTime,
     ?   updatedAt?: DateTimeFilter | DateTime,
     ?   authStrategies?: StringNullableFilter | String | Null,
     ?   isGuest?: BoolFilter | Boolean,
     ?   walletAddress?: StringNullableFilter | String | Null,
     ?   twoFactorEnabled?: BoolFilter | Boolean,
     ?   twoFactorSecret?: StringNullableFilter | String | Null,
     ?   twoFactorBackupCodes?: StringNullableFilter | String | Null,
     ?   twoFactorEnabledAt?: DateTimeNullableFilter | DateTime | Null,
     ?   blacklistedTokens?: BlacklistedTokenListRelationFilter,
     ?   devices?: DeviceRegistrationListRelationFilter,
     ?   emailVerifications?: EmailVerificationListRelationFilter,
     ?   linkedAccounts?: LinkedAccountListRelationFilter,
     ?   refreshTokens?: RefreshTokenListRelationFilter,
     ?   smartProfiles?: SmartProfileListRelationFilter,
     ?   socialProfiles?: SocialProfileListRelationFilter,
     ?   dragOperations?: DragOperationListRelationFilter
       }
     })

Argument `where` of type UserWhereUniqueInput needs at least one of `id` or `email` arguments. Available options are marked with ?.
